name: get_legal_hold_policy_assignments_id
description: Retrieve a legal hold policy assignment.

legal_hold_policy_assignment_id.description: The ID of the legal hold policy assignment

$block:
Legal Hold Assignments are used to assign Legal Hold
Policies to Users, Folders, Files, or File Versions.

Creating a Legal Hold Assignment puts a hold
on the File-Versions that belong to the Assignment's
'apply-to' entity.

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for this legal hold assignment
**assigned_at**: When the legal hold policy assignment object was
**deleted_at**: When the assignment release request was sent.
**context_info**: A free-form object that contains additional context
**help_url**: A URL that links to more information about why this error occurred.
**message**: A short message describing the error.
**request_id**: A unique identifier for this response, which can be used
**status**: The HTTP status of the response.
